This is [my](about.qmd) attempt at [digital gardening](https://lyz-code.github.io/blue-book/digital_garden/). Some people use the term [bliki](https://martinfowler.com/bliki/WhatIsaBliki.html) to describe this kind of information curation.

"Sansans" means "sans answers". Don't even try to look for any answers to any questions you might have here. It is only my personal online space. Things that I find *noteworthy*.
